steps.description: Beginning on the right lead, complete three circles to the right: the first two circles large and fast; the third circle small and slow. Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a large fast circle to the right.
Complete a small slow circle to the right.
Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the right. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the right.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Beginning on the left lead, complete three circles to the left: the first two circles large and fast; the third circle small and slow. Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a large fast circle to the left.
Complete a small slow circle to the left.
Stop at the center of the arena. Hesitate.

steps.description: Complete four spins to the left. Hesitate.

primitives.description: Complete four spins to the left.
Hesitate.

steps.description: Beginning on the right lead, run a large fast circle to the right. Change leads at the center of the arena.

primitives.description: Run a large fast circle to the right.
Change leads at the center of the arena.

steps.description: Run a large fast circle to the left. Change leads at the center of the arena.

primitives.description: Run a large fast circle to the left.
Change leads at the center of the arena.

steps.description: Continue around previous circle to the right. Run down the middle to the far end of the arena past the end marker and do a right rollback—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Continue around previous circle to the right.
Run down the middle to the far end of the arena past the end marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the right with no hesitation.

steps.description: Run up the middle to the opposite end of the arena past the end marker and do a left rollback—no hesitation.

primitives.description: Run up the middle to the opposite end of the arena past the end marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Complete a half spin to the left with no hesitation.

steps.description: Run past the center marker and do a sliding stop. Back up to the center of the arena or at least ten feet (three meters). Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.

primitives.description: Run past the center marker.
Do a sliding stop.
Back up to center of the arena or at least ten feet.
Hesitate to demonstrate completion of the pattern.
